forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West northwest wind 5 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the day begins with a refreshing embrace of sunshine, illuminating the city with a gentle warmth, even as temperatures hover around a comfortable sixty degrees. The sky is a brilliant blue, unblemished by clouds, providing an unobstructed view of the iconic structures that define the skyline. The west winds whisper through the streets, carrying a playful chill that hints at the briskness of the afternoon. As the day unfolds, expect temperatures to gracefully taper to around sixty, inviting those who seek a leisurely stroll to enjoy the crispness without the worry of needing heavy layers.

As evening approaches, the charm of the city transforms into a partly cloudy canvas, under which the mercury will dip to a mild fifty-two. It’s an enchanting time to be outdoors; perhaps savoring a warm drink at a café with a view or meandering through one of the city’s many parks, as the wind gently rustles the autumn leaves. With little sign of fog or a thick marine layer today, the visibility is splendid, making it an ideal moment for photography or simply indulging in the exquisite beauty of San Francisco. A light jacket would suffice as the day drifts into night, and perhaps a cozy scarf to wrap around oneself—a small luxury we can embrace during these autumn evenings.
